resources.string: EcoLegend
Settings
CARBON FOOTPRINT
LET\'S GET STARTED
The average person in the United States produces more than 25 tons of carbon dioxide a year...
That\'s equal to
58,000 miles
14,000 burgers
300,000 smartphone ch.?
Welcome, EcoApprentice
You are on the first step to becoming an EcoLegend changing that number
Initial Quiz
In what kind of setting do you live?
How big is your home?
How many people live in your household?
Check all sources of energy you use in your home:
How much natural gas does your household consume?
How much electricity does your household consume?
How much fuel oil does your household consume?
How much propane does your household consume?
Which of the following best describes your dietary habits?
Do you regularly recycle?
Which of the following modes of transportation do you primarily use?
How many vehicles do you own?
Are your vehicles electric?
What is your average mileage for each vehicle?
What is the average fuel economy of your vehicles?
How often do you use transit?
How often do you use a bus?
Have you flown in the past year?
How many small round trip flights have you taken in the past year? (<1 hour)
Medium? (1-4 hours)
Long? (>4 hours)
How many nights have you spent in a hotel in the past year?
